mapper.select: SELECT video_id, video_title, video_content, video_source, publish_time, create_time, event_time, is_public FROM tb_video WHERE to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < event_time AND event_time < to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LIMIT #{length} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT video_id, video_title, video_content, video_source, publish_time, create_time FROM tb_video WHERE video_id = #{videoId}
SELECT video_id, video_title, video_content, video_source, publish_time, create_time FROM tb_video WHERE video_title = #{title}
SELECT COUNT(RESOURCE_ID) FROM tb_tag_resource_map WHERE tag_name = #{tagName} AND resource_type = 'tb_video'

SELECT video_id, video_title, video_content, video_source, publish_time, create_time FROM tb_video v, tb_tag_resource_map m WHERE tag_name = #{tagName} AND m.resource_id=v.video_id AND m.resource_type = 'tb_video'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_video (video_id, video_title, video_content, video_source, publish_time, create_time, is_public) VALUES (#{video.videoId}, #{video.videoTitle}, #{video.videoContent}, #{video.videoSource}, #{video.videoPublishTime}, #{video.videoCreateTime}, #{video.isPublic}, #{video.eventTime});
